name: basic-vite-react
label: Basic Template
description: Lightweight Vite starter template for building fast static websites

name: 2d-phaser-sprite-character-gravity
label: 2D Phaser Sprite Character Gravity Template
description: Template with animated sprite characters using Phaser, featuring gravity for jumping mechanics. Ideal for basic PLATFORMER games.

name: 2d-phaser-basic
label: 2D Phaser Basic Template
description: Template with basic 2D game using Phaser. Ideal for basic 2D game.

name: basic-3d-freeview
label: 3D Character Freeview Template
description: Three.js 3D game template with free camera movement. Features character controls and exploration in a 3D environment with unrestricted camera angles.

name: basic-3d-quarterview
label: 3D Character Quarterview Template
description: Three.js single-player top-down game template similar to Hades. Features character control from a quarter view orthographic camera with keyboard controls.

name: basic-3d-point-to-move
label: 3D Character Point To Move Template
description: Three.js single-player top-down game template similar to League of Legends. Features character control from a quarter view orthographic camera with click-to-move functionality

name: basic-3d-flightview
label: 3D Airplane Flightview Template
description: A Three.js single-player flight airplane game template inspired by Pieter Levels' game, featuring a low-poly plane flying freely.

name: basic-3d-firstpersonview
label: 3D First Person View (FPS) Template
description: Three.js single-player first-person view (FPS) game template. Control your character through a first-person camera perspective, simulating the player's own eyes, with movement and keyboard controls.

name: basic-3d-sideview
label: 3D Character Sideview Template
description: Three.js single-player sideview game template. Features character control from a side view orthographic camera with horizontal movement and keyboard controls.

name: basic-3d-minecraft
description: Three.js fixed camera game template inspired by Minecraft. A voxel-style 3D Minecraft example is implemented. This templates ready to use, camera system, character system, and map system.
label: 3D Character Minecraft Template
